Name: Bookshelf
About the game: Bookshelf provides a simple way to store and read eBooks. Integrated with Steam, your friends will see which book you're reading and your progress through reading it. From text-books to graphic novels, we intend provide various reader preferences for your optimal reading. - Track weekly reading time via your Steam Profile - Show your friends which books you're reading - Track progress in each book Bookshelf currently supports ePub and PDF formats, we are actively adding more supported types; along with more reader options!
Meta Title: Bookshelf: Feb 19, 2021, Colton Lathrop and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Bookshelf? Check out the release date (Feb 19, 2021), developer insights from Colton Lathrop, and a complete game summary.
